Convertor is distributed as a compressed archive. To install it, just uncompress
it somewhere. Then you can run 'convertor.exe' directly, and maybe create a shortcut
on your desktop.

The directory structure is:

<verbatim>
  -- convertor\
     -- convertor.exe
     -- UnitData.xml
     -- convertor.ini
</verbatim>

The file 'convertor.ini' will be created after the first run.

<h3>Windows binaries:</h3>

  #  <b>zip archive</b> - [./convertor-20120408.zip | convertor.zip]
  #  <b>7z archive</b> - [./convertor-20120408.7z | convertor.7z]
  #  <b>Cryptographic checksums</b> - [./convertor-md5.txt | convertor-md5.txt]
